reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be of great quality, with a perfect oversized fit and soft, comfortable material that's not itchy. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it runs slightly big.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like it’s tailored just for you
items.body: This sweater is perfect in every way. I almost never buy sweaters because I typically cannot stand the feel of the fabric and at most I can tolerate it. I also feel like most sweaters aren’t designed to compliment my body. I dont have curvy hips, my booty is a sandwich, my shoulders and ribs are bigger than average, I have a bit of a belly, and I have poles for legs to hold it all up. Most things made in this style make me look bigger, hide all my assets, and accentuate the frumpy bits. I end up feeling like a blob in most sweaters. In THIS sweater, I feel so cute. It is a perfect length and hugs in the right spots, hangs in the right spots and the right ways, and is such a good weight that it just drapes across your body in a flattering way. Everyone was looking at my like I was cute when I wore it out. Even my sibiling was taken aback by my outfit and she told me it’s her favorite clothing item on me. It feels like a good hug. It’s cozy and comfy and cute. It’s high quality, well made, and feels like it was tailored just for me. I hesitated on spending the money, but I’m so glad I got this. It is one of my favorite ever clothing items. You won’t regret it! If I could give this 6 stars I would! Read more
items.author: DeadpanAnn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality cardigan!
items.body: The best cardigan! Feels like high quality. Super comfortable and very soft! Feels durable as well! I got the camel colored one and it’s gorgeous. I’m already planning to get more colors! Not itchy at all. I was on the fence about getting a small or medium because I’m usually a size small but cardigans I like them to be a tad baggier. I end up getting a medium to be safe. And it fits perfectly oversized! I’m 5’7 and 120 lbs. I really love that this is made of 100% cotton! The waffle knit is so nice and unique! The cardigan looks even better in person. Great length for my long arms but not overly long either! Read more
items.author: Riah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality thick cardigan
items.body: I bought this for a friend and she loves it. She said it is so soft and comfortable. Her little cousin wants one now. It's heavy duty , so it's not one of those thin light ones , it'll actually keep you warm. Read more
items.author: B. Morgan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater
items.body: Great sweater, i went up one size to get oversized look and it was perfect. Color is great. warm but not hot. Have not washed yet so cannot speak to that yet. Also ordered the green one. Read more
items.author: Katrina Wilson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and breathable
items.body: Love the feel and the weight. The most important that it’s made of cotton in my body can breathe. I bought four different colors. My natural size is S but I bought M and it’s oversized and comfy. I am washing the ivory color now and let you know how it went. So, after one washing in cold water, it shrank a little. But it was expected that’s why I ordered one size larger, instead of my natural size S. Read more
items.author: Alla M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfy, size up
items.body: It’s absolutely perfect. It’s soft and I got the 3x even though I normally wear a 2x roughly because I wanted it to be oversized and it fit perfectly and gave the exact look that I wanted it to. Read more
items.author: Annamarie Marlieb

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as oversized as advertised but cute
items.body: Cute and very well made but not as over sized as id like.. and I ordered a size up. Still cute tho Read more
items.author: Hannah Norman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sweater!
items.body: This has quickly become my favorite sweater. I wear it all the time. It’s so soft and cozy, not itchy at all. The fabric is great quality and heavy. I am normally a size large but I bought an XL for an oversized look that covers my bum. I loved this so much I also bought my daughter one in a size M. Her medium fits me as well but in a more fitted look. You can’t go wrong with this wardrobe staple. Read more
items.author: Erika

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, 04navy, 05green, 10pink, 07ivory, Burgundy, Dark Grey, Hot Pink, Light Green, Camel, 08mustard, Off-white, Wine Red, 06milk Tea. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
